other_tests.procedure_name: Laparoscopic decortication of the renal cyst
other_tests.findings: A unicystic tumor in the middle and upper pole of the left kidney was revealed. The inner wall of the cyst was smooth, the cystic fluid was clear, and there was no obvious connection between the cyst and the renal pelvis.

other_tests.procedure_name: Radical nephrectomy of the left kidney
other_tests.findings: Histological examination of the resected cyst wall revealed immature nephrons of different sizes/stages of differentiation. The diagnosis of CPDN (Cystic Partially Differentiated Nephroblastoma) was confirmed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A second histopathological examination after the radical nephrectomy also showed CPDN.

other_tests.findings: Immunohistochemistry results showed vimentin (+), Wilms tumor protein (+), epithelial membrane antigen (+), acidic calcium-binding protein S-100 (−), neuron-specific enolase (−), and a protein Ki-67 index of 17%.
